description: An extremly potent and explosive Gunpowder to come from the Chemists of Labrynna. Named for its successful field test against a coven of Witches.
tooltip: An extremly potent and explosive Gunpowder to come from the Chemists of Labrynna. Named for its successful field test against a coven of Witches. (Increases the damage of all Gunpowder units by 10%)
